name: Didgery
description: Didgery is a unique merger of card and puzzle that blends fun explosive action with thoughtful strategy. Sit back and relax in Zen Mode, or put your skills to the ultimate test by battling the forces of evil in Nightmare Mode.
minimum_requirements: OS: XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium 4 1.8Ghz or greater Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia 6600GT DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or greater Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or AMD Athlon 64 X2 4400+ Graphics: Nvidia 8800GTS or greater DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 400 MB available space
